title: refactor: extract function
description: extract a pure, named function from a code region with tests.
context: prefer pure functions; avoid hidden globals; keep signatures small.
instructions: 1) propose a function signature and name. 2) extract code and remove side effects where possible. 3) add unit tests for the new function. 4) update call sites. return code only.
model_tips: fail fast on large implicit dependencies.
risks: behavior changes if side effects are removed incorrectly.
